quarks.connectors.serial

Interface SerialDevice

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TopologyElement

    public interface SerialDevice
extends TopologyElement
    Access to a device (or devices) connected by a serial port. A serial port at runtime is represented by a SerialPort.

    SerialDevice is typically used through a protocol module that sends the appropriate bytes to the port and decodes the bytes output by the port.

    It is guaranteed that during any call to function returned by this interface has exclusive access to SerialPort.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> Supplier<T> getSource(Function<SerialPort,T> driver)
      Create a function that can be used to source a stream from a serial port device.
      void setInitializer(Consumer<SerialPort> initializer)

      • Methods inherited from interface quarks.topology.TopologyElement

        topology

    • Method Detail

      • setInitializer

        void setInitializer(Consumer<SerialPort> initializer)
        Set the initialization function for this port. Can be used to send setup instructions to the device connected to this serial port.
        initializer.accept(port) is called once, passing a runtime SerialPort for this serial device.
        Parameters:
        initializer - Function to be called when the application runs.

      • getSource

        <T> Supplier<T> getSource(Function<SerialPort,T> driver)
        Create a function that can be used to source a stream from a serial port device.
        Calling get() on the returned function will result in a call to driver.apply(serialPort) passing a runtime SerialPort for this serial device. The value returned by driver.apply(serialPort) is returned by this returned function.
        The function driver typically sends instructions to the serial port using SerialPort.getOutput() and then reads the result using SerialPort.getInput().

        Multiple instances of a supplier function can be created, for example to read different parameters from the device connected to the serial port. While each function is being called it has exclusive use of the serial port.

        Parameters:
        driver - Function that interacts with the serial port to produce a value.
        Returns:
        Function that for each call will interact with the serial port to produce a value.
        See Also:
        Topology.poll(Supplier, long, TimeUnit)
